attributes.action: Allow for comments to be added to e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are a lot of petitions on here. Some are ridiculous, some need further comment,  some need praise. 

Sometime you do not want to "sign" the petition, but may wish to offer another view on the topic in question. 

This idea has been used in many places on the internet, and could be used to great effect here.

rejection.details: Feedback for petitions should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
